title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5705.8 - Possession and consumption of alcoholic beverages
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 5705.8 - Possession and consumption of alcoholic beverages

State Regulations

No person shall consume any intoxicating beverage, nor have
in his or her possession any open bottle or container containing liquor, beer, wine or other alcoholic beverage, while such person is making a vehicular
crossing. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
5705.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
